content: विन्यस् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To put down, deposit, place; विन्यस्यंती भुवि गणनया देहलीदत्तषुष्पैः <ls>Me. 87</ls>; <ls>Bk. 3. 3.</ls> {@--2@} To fix in or on, direct towards; रामे विन्यस्तमानसाः <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--3@} To deliver or make over, commit to the care of, entrust; सुतविन्यस्तपत्नीकः <ls>Y. 3. 45.</ls> {@--4@} To arrange, dispose, adjust.
